titleStmt.title: The defence of militarie profession Wherein is eloquently shewed the due commendation of martiall prowesse, and plainly prooued how necessary the exercise of armes is for this our age.
titleStmt.author: Gates, Geffrey.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Middleton, for Iohn Harison,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
